text: 6:18 Rom 12:13; Galesia 6:6; Taitus 3:8; Hibru 13:16; Jems 2:5Nɨ kamaghɨn me mɨkɨmam, me arazir aghuir avɨribar amuva igharaz darazir akurvagh. Egh me zurara bizir avɨriba gumazamizir biziba puvatɨzibar anɨng. Egh me uan dagɨabagh nɨghnɨgh suam, kar en bizimra puvatɨ. Guizbangɨra, me bizir taba isɨva igharaz darazir akurvagh.
